thread.title: Watch LeBron James’ no-look nutmeg assist
thread.title_full: Watch LeBron James’ no-look nutmeg assist

author: USA TODAY
title: Watch LeBron James’ no-look nutmeg assist
text:
Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Watch LeBron James’ no-look nutmeg assist WHOA. Watch LeBron James’ no-look nutmeg assist WHOA.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/lebron-james-no-look-nutmeg-nba-career-assist-holy-wow-video-best-passes-what-cavaliers/   Watch LeBron James’ no-look nutmeg assist Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY 9:41   
Cleveland Cavaliers forward LeBron James (23) calls a play during the first quarter against the Minnesota Timberwolves at Target Center. (Photo: Brace Hemmelgarn-USA TODAY Sport) 
LeBron James did this on Tuesday night. It's a no-look nutmeg assist and it's phenomenal and wow, there is just so much going on here. This. Pass. WHAT?! pic.twitter.com/QM2LKCJvC1 — NBA on ESPN (@ESPNNBA) February 15, 2017 It's a two-handed between-the-legs pass. LeBron turned his head to even further throw off all the Timberwolves defenders. Kyle Korver was chilling at the 3-point line. LeBron didn't have to make that pass. He had options. 
This is probably the greatest pass LeBron has ever made. Yes, he has pulled off no-look over-the-head passes and other incredible no-look passes, but do any of these compete with the no-look nutmeg? 
I don't think so. None of those seem better - and yet somehow, I feel like he can do even better, though. I don't know how, but he's LeBron James. 
One more thing to note: LeBron is averaging a career-high 8.8 assists per game this season. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/lebron-james-no-look-nutmeg-nba-career-assist-holy-wow-video-best-passes-what-cavaliers/ Most Popular
